content: “You don’t want to see LeBron James motivated. LeBron’s line in Cleveland’s 121–117 victory was 28 points, 14 assists, and nine boards, which is right around the 23.4 points, 9.6 assists, and 8.9 boards per game averages that he has put up in this ruthlessly efficient season.”You don’t want to see LeBron motivated… because he’ll be average! …what?
